title.native: 学園ベビーシッターズ

description:
The manga centers on the brothers Ryuuichi and Kotarou Kashima. Ryuuichi is in high school and Kotarou is still a toddler. After their parents are killed in a plane crash, the two brothers find themselves living with the chairwoman of the Morinomiya Academy, who herself lost her son and daughter-in-law in the same accident. The chairwoman, however, has one stipulation for the brothers in order to live with her: Ryuuichi has to work at the academy's daycare center as a babysitter.

(Source: Anime News Network)
synonyms: นักเรียนพี่เลี้ยงเด็ก

tags.name: School Club
tags.description: Partly or completely set in a school club scene.

tags.name: Primarily Child Cast
tags.description: Main cast is mostly composed of characters below a high school age.

tags.name: Iyashikei
tags.description: Primary aim is to heal the audience through serene depictions of characters' daily lives.

tags.name: Chibi
tags.description: Features "super deformed" character designs with smaller, rounder proportions and a cute look.

tags.name: School
tags.description: Partly or completely set in a primary or secondary educational institution.

tags.name: Cute Boys Doing Cute Things
tags.description: Centers around male characters doing cute activities, usually with little to no emphasis on drama and conflict.

tags.name: Family Life
tags.description: Centers around the activities of a family unit.

tags.name: Shoujo
tags.description: Target demographic is teenage and young adult females.

tags.name: Primarily Male Cast
tags.description: Main cast is mostly composed of male characters.

tags.name: Twins
tags.description: Prominently features two or more siblings that were born at one birth.

tags.name: Tragedy
tags.description: Centers around tragic events and unhappy endings.

tags.name: Tsundere
tags.description: Prominently features a character who acts cold and hostile in order to mask warmer emotions.

tags.name: Parenthood
tags.description: Centers around the experience of raising a child.

node.description:
**Height:** 174 cm (5'8.5")

[Twitter](https://twitter.com/onoDofficial) | [Instagram](https://www.instagram.com/onodofficial/) | [Youtube](https://www.youtube.com/channel/UCHuKRxu3ILwezuNBjpxkIxg) | [Website](http://daisukeono.com/) | [Profile (Lantis)](http://www.lantis.jp/artist.php?id=f4165cba759b0eccd6448d4e72b4d9ad)

**Non-Anime Roles**:
- Jing Yuan - Honkai: Star Rail (VG)
- Wriothesley - Genshin Impact (VG)
- Van Arkride - The Legend of Heroes Series (VG)

[Official Website](https://www.lantis.jp/nishiyamakoutaro/) | [Profile ](https://www.81produce.co.jp/dcms_plusdb/index.php/item?cell003=%E3%81%AA%E8%A1%8C&label=1&page=2&cell004=&name=%E8%A5%BF%E5%B1%B1%E3%80%80%E5%AE%8F%E5%A4%AA%E6%9C%97&id=98) | [Twitter](https://twitter.com/Koutarotaro)

Koutaro Nishiyama is a Japanese voice actor and singer. He is currently affiliated with 81 Produce. In 2018, he won the Best New Actor Award at the 12th Seiyu Awards.

__Height:__ 173 cm
__Hobbies:__ classic music appreciation, piano, guitar, singing

[Profile](https://www.artsvision.co.jp/talent/294/) | [Twitter](https://twitter.com/UmeuMeumE_Y) | [Wiki (en)](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Yūichirō_Umehara) | [Wiki (jp)](https://ja.m.wikipedia.org/wiki/梅原裕一郎)

A voice actor affiliated with [Arts Vision](https://anilist.co/studio/6367).

He revealed on April 4th, 2024 that he has been married to his college classmate since 2016.

**Non-Anime Roles:**
- Alhaitham - Genshin Impact (VG)
- Leona Kingscholar - Disney Twisted-Wonderland (VG)
**Takamura Yuki** is a Japanese publicity producer, who also provides assistance to various works.
Ruka Kawada is a Japanese composer, orchestrator and keyboard player from Hokkaido Prefecture, Japan.
Tatsuya Ishiguro is an animation producer and director.
